original_text: Solomon also made strong the cities where he stored things and the cities where he kept his chariots and horses. He built everything that he wanted to build in Jerusalem, in Lebanon and everywhere in his kingdom.
korean_text: 자기에게 있는 모든 국고성과 병거성들과 마병의 성들을 건축하고 솔로몬이 또 예루살렘과 레바논과 그가 다스리는 온 땅에 건축하고자 하던 것을 다 건축하였는데

sentences.original_text: Solomon also made strong the cities where he stored things
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬은 또한 물건을 저장하던 도시들을 견고하게 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: and the cities where he kept his chariots and horses
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 전차와 말들을 두었던 도시들을 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: He built everything that he wanted to build
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 건축하고 싶었던 모든 것을 건설했습니다
